Parameters: int: The reason for failure could be one of: @B_android#net#wifi#WifiManager#LocalOnlyHotspotCallback#ERROR_TETHERING_DISALLOWED_E@, @B_android#net#wifi#WifiManager#LocalOnlyHotspotCallback#ERROR_INCOMPATIBLE_MODE_E@, @B_android#net#wifi#WifiManager#LocalOnlyHotspotCallback#ERROR_NO_CHANNEL_E@, or @B_android#net#wifi#WifiManager#LocalOnlyHotspotCallback#ERROR_GENERIC_E@.
onFailed(int).Description: LocalOnlyHotspot failed to start. Applications can attempt to call @B_android#net#wifi#WifiManager#startLocalOnlyHotspot_E@ again at a later time.

onStopped().Description: LocalOnlyHotspot stopped. The LocalOnlyHotspot can be disabled at any time by the user. When this happens, applications will be notified that it was stopped. This will not be invoked when an application calls @B_android#net#wifi#WifiManager#LocalOnlyHotspotReservation#close_E@.

ClassDesc: Callback class for applications to receive updates about the LocalOnlyHotspot status.
